verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let everything that, everything that
everything that has breath
praise the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise You in the morning
Praise You in the evening
Praise You when I'm young and when I'm old

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise You when I'm laughing
Praise You when I'm grieving
Praise You every season of the soul

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
If we could see how much Your worth
Your power, Your might, Your endless love
Then surely we would never cease to praise

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Praise You in the heavens
Joining with the angels
Praising You forever and a day

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Praise You on the earth now
joining with creation
Calling all the nations to Your praise

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
If they could see how much Your worth
Your power, Your might, Your endless love
Then surely they would never cease to praise
